DataElement.preferredName: Specimen Storage Future Use Patient Consent Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text term to signify if consent has been granted to store specimens from an individual for future use.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis_The act of safekeeping goods in a depository._Use; put into service; make work or employ (something) for a particular purpose or for its inherent or natural purpose._Permission to do something._

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis.:The act of safekeeping goods in a depository.

Concepts.definition: A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis.
The act of safekeeping goods in a depository.

Property.preferredDefinition: A time that is yet to come.:Use; put into service; make work or employ (something) for a particular purpose or for its inherent or natural purpose.:Permission to do something.

Concepts.definition: A time that is yet to come.
A manner, or usual, or accepted practice of using something.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: patients' acknowledgement and acceptance of participation in a clinical trial.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.name: Consent for specimen storage
ReferenceDocuments.description: Consent for specimen storage for future use?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text1
ReferenceDocuments.description: My samples and related information may be kept in a Biobank for use in future health research.

ReferenceDocuments.name: My blood samples and related information may be kept in a Biobank for use in future health research.
ReferenceDocuments.description: My blood samples and related information may be kept in a Biobank for use in future health research.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text2
ReferenceDocuments.description: My pre-study blood and related information may be kept in a Biobank for use in future health research.

ReferenceDocuments.name: My tissue and blood samples and related information may be kept in a Biobank for use in future health research.
ReferenceDocuments.description: My tissue and blood samples and related information may be kept in a Biobank for use in future health research.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient has agreed to have stool collected and has agreed that stool and related information may be kept in a Biobank for use in future health research.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient has agreed to have stool collected and has given permission to use his/her stool sample(s) and related information may be kept in a Biobank for use in future health research .

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text5
ReferenceDocuments.description: My samples and related information may be used for additional studies.

ReferenceDocuments.name: I agree that my samples and related health information may be kept in a biobank for use in future health research.
ReferenceDocuments.description: I agree that my samples and related health information may be kept in a biobank for use in future health research.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text6
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient has agreed that his/her stool samples may be collected and his/her stool samples and related information may be kept in a Biobank for use in future health research.

ReferenceDocuments.name: DCP Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: IF YES: Does the participant agree that the liver biopsy tissue stored at the hospital can be used for this study?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text7
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient has agreed that his/her blood and tissue sample(s) and related information may be kept in a Biobank for use in future health research.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text8
ReferenceDocuments.description: My Stool and related information may be kept in a Biobank for use in future health research.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 9
ReferenceDocuments.description: I agree that my blood samples and related health information may be used for the laboratory (circulating biomarker) study described above and I agree that my samples and related health information may be kept in a biobank for use in future health research.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Alliance 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient has agreed that his/her sample(s) and related information may be kept in a Biobank for use in future health research.

ReferenceDocuments.name: I agree that my tissue and blood samples and related health information may be kept in a biobank for use in future health research.
ReferenceDocuments.description: I agree that my tissue and blood samples and related health information may be kept in a biobank for use in future health research.

DataElement.changeDescription: 9/8/15 New version required due to versioning of the VD per D. Reeves.TT_Curated for Duke University adoption of C3D.
